# Pull Request

## Type of Change

- [ ] New prompt submission
- [ ] Prompt improvement/update
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Infrastructure/tooling change

## Description

[Provide a clear description of your changes]

## Related Issues

Closes #[issue number]

## Checklist

### For New Prompts:
- [ ] Used the standard prompt template
- [ ] Prompt is placed in appropriate category folder
- [ ] File named using kebab-case
- [ ] All metadata fields completed
- [ ] Tested on at least one AI model
- [ ] Included at least one working example
- [ ] Documented variables and limitations
- [ ] No duplicate of existing prompt
- [ ] Validation script passes: `python scripts/validate_prompt.py [filepath]`

### For Prompt Updates:
- [ ] Changes are clearly described
- [ ] Version number incremented
- [ ] Changelog updated
- [ ] Examples still work with changes
- [ ] Backward compatibility considered

### For All Submissions:
- [ ] No harmful content
- [ ] Follows code of conduct
- [ ] Documentation is clear
- [ ] Commit messages are descriptive

**Model(s) tested:** [e.g., Claude Sonnet 4, GPT-4]

```
[Paste relevant test outputs or describe testing performed]
```

**For Reviewers:**

### Review Checklist
- [ ] Format compliant
- [ ] Quality standards met
- [ ] Examples are reproducible
- [ ] Categorization appropriate
- [ ] No safety concerns
- [ ] Documentation clear

**Review 1:** @[reviewer1] - [ ] Approved / [ ] Changes Requested
**Review 2:** @[reviewer2] - [ ] Approved / [ ] Changes Requested

**Merge Decision:** [ ] Approved for merge / [ ] Needs changes
